Key Match Events: Finn Allen hit an entertaining 42 off just 16 balls
Devon Conway carried his bat for a 58-ball-92
Australia never got going in their chase, with just Glenn Maxwell (28) and Pat Cummins (21) passing 20 as the hosts were bowled out for 111
Post-Match Reflections: Maxwell told ABC Sport after the match, "They played brilliantly. They got too many runs and we weren't able to get partnerships, all the way through the innings we kept losing wickets. It was basically how not to play a T20."

Santner told ABC Sport, "It's obviously a tough place to win, we've found that over the years so, it was nice to fire some shots early tonight. It's obviously a long tournament, any team in this pool can upset anyone."
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Sydney Cricket Ground (SCG)
The defending champions Australia have been comprehensively beaten by New Zealand
New Zealand had not beaten Australia in Australia in any format of the game since 2011
Others: The Black Caps romped to victory with a 89-run margin
Tim Southee finished with figures of 3-6 and Mitch Santner 3-31 from four overs as the Black Caps bowled out Australia for 111
